text: Egha Iesus men sure gamuava kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Gumazibar Otarim bar mɨzazir ekiaba koma osɨmtɨziba iniam. Eghtɨma gumazir aruaba, koma ofa gamir gumazir ekiaba, koma Judan arazibagh fozir gumaziba, me an aghuaghɨva a mɨsueghtɨma an aremegham. Egh dughiar pumuning ko mɨkezim gɨvaghtɨ a ua dɨkavigham.”
